data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 2, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Portimonense are whistled for offside.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Portimonense.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Estadio Municipal de Portimao, Carlos Carvalho has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 7, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Portimonense have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Santa Clara.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Santa Clara in Portimao.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Fabio Verissimo signals a Portimonense throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lincoln (Santa Clara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 15, Portimonense push upfield but Fabio Verissimo quickly pulls them for offside.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In the minute 18, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 19, Santa Clara's Osama Rashid has been booked in Portimao.
Can Portimonense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Portimonense close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
In the minute 24, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Portimonense.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Fabio Verissimo signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Portimonense's Fabricio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Santa Clara defender.
Portimonense's Anderson de Oliveira da Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 28, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
In the minute 30, In Portimao, Joao Afonso (Santa Clara) misses the target with a header.
Fabio Verissimo awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Portimonense.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Portimonense.
In the minute 32, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Nene is booked for the away team.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Free kick Santa Clara.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Carlos Carvalho of Santa Clara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Santa Clara take a 0-1 lead thanks to Fabio Cardoso.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
In the minute 39, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Portimonense drives forward and Welinton Junior gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 41, In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Koki Anzai (Portimonense) has received a yellow card from Fabio Verissimo.
Fabio Verissimo waits before resuming play because Pedro Sa for Portimonense is still down.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Santa Clara are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Fabio Verissimo blows to end the first-half.
Portimonense make their first substitution with Ricardo Vaz Te replacing Pedro Sa.
The second half has started at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 46, Fabio Verissimo signals a Portimonense throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Paulo Sergio (Portimonense) is making a second substitution, with Aylton Boa Morte replacing Welinton Junior.
In the minute 46, Fahd Moufi is replacing Koki Anzai for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Portimao Portimonense attack through Aylton Boa Morte. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 47, Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Portimonense.
In the minute 49, Portimonense drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Portimonense are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 52, Fabio Cardoso (Santa Clara) has received a first yellow card.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Portimonense, close to Santa Clara's area.
Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Santa Clara.
Santa Clara pushes forward through Lincoln, whose finish on goal is saved.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
In the minute 57, Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
Santa Clara take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Thiago Santana.
In the minute 59, In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lucas Fernandes for Portimonense has been booked by Fabio Verissimo and receives a first yellow card.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 64, Ricardo Vaz Te's header is off-target for Portimonense.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Santa Clara.
Goal! Aylton Boa Morte (Portimonense) scores with a header to reduce the deficit to 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Lucas Fernandes.
In the minute 68, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Portimonense have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Carlos Carvalho of Santa Clara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
In the minute 71, Fabio Verissimo awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Marco Pereira is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The away team have replaced Ukra with Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis. This is the first substitution made today by Daniel Ramos.
In the minute 74, Daniel Ramos is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Municipal de Portimao with Anderson Carvalho replacing Nene.
Marco Pereira is back on the pitch.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 76, Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Portimonense have an attacking throw-in.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Santa Clara, close to Portimonense's area.
In the minute 77, Play has been interrupted briefly in Portimao to check on Osama Rashid, who is grimacing with pain.
Lucas Fernandes is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Paulo Sergio (Portimonense) is making a fourth substitution, with Fernando Medeiros replacing Lucas Fernandes.
Throw-in Portimonense.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Fali Cande with Henrique Gelain.
Osama Rashid is back on his feet again.
In the minute 80, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis (Santa Clara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick Portimonense.
Cristian Gonzalez is replacing Lincoln for the away team.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Aylton Boa Morte (Portimonense) has received a yellow card from Fabio Verissimo.
Free kick in a good position for Santa Clara!
In the minute 85, Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis (Santa Clara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 86, Fabio Verissimo signals a Portimonense throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Portimonense push forward at Estadio Municipal de Portimao and Aylton Boa Morte gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santa Clara defence.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In the minute 87, Can Portimonense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
At Estadio Municipal de Portimao the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Portimonense have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Portimonense close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Portimonense in Portimao.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Municipal de Portimao with Pierre Sagna replacing Rafael Ramos.
Costinha is replacing Carlos Carvalho for Santa Clara at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Marco Pereira (Santa Clara) gets a yellow card.
